description:
"I'm straight," Jason said, then quickly corrected: "But I'm going to say I'm 'bi-curious'."
He's 20, with blond hair, blue eyes, a ripped body, and an uncut dick. He's also really friendly and smiles a lot!
"Ever gotten fucked in the ass?"
"No," Jason said. "I'm still a virgin when it comes to that."
"Have you fucked a guy in the ass?"
"I haven't."
"Have you done anything with a guy?"
"I've gotten head a few times from a guy," he said.
"Did you squirt your load into his mouth?"
"I did."
Hopefully we can convince him to take the next step!
title: Jason
